description.ko: 영원한 어둠이 깔린 심해 속에서 생체 발광 생물들이 빚어내는 신비로운 빛의 향연을 탐험해보세요.
description.en: Explore the mysterious depths of the ocean where bioluminescent creatures light up the eternal darkness of the abyss.

prompt: cinematic shot of a deep sea abyss, glowing bioluminescent jellyfish and strange aquatic plants, dark navy and neon blue color palette, high detail, 8k resolution, ethereal atmosphere, underwater photography style
